meanings.sent1: I will redo my homework to correct the mistakes.
meanings.sent2: She decided to redo her room with a fresh coat of paint.
meanings.sent3: Let's redo the puzzle, but this time blindfolded!
meanings.sent4: He wanted to redo his life like a painter with a blank canvas.
meanings.sent5: The teacher asked us to redo the experiment for better results.

meanings.definition: To make something new or improved by doing it again
meanings.sent1: They will redo the garden to make it more colorful.
meanings.sent2: The chef decided to redo the recipe with extra spices.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled the paint, so I had to redo the artwork.
meanings.sent4: She wanted to redo her wardrobe like a fashion designer.
meanings.sent5: The team had to redo the presentation for a polished look.
